name: Damian Franciszek Pospiech
profile_summary:
Senior Network Engineer with 13+ years of experience in delivering high-performance network solutions across healthcare and financial sectors. Skilled in Cloud Services including **AWS**, **Azure**, and **OCI**, with proven expertise in network security technologies such as **Firewall**, **VPN**, **Proxies**, and **ISD/IPS**. Proficient in Troubleshooting and Documentation, ensuring compliance and optimization of complex network infrastructures.
Strong knowledge of TCP/IP, BGP, and industrial security certifications including **CompTIA Security+**, **Cisco CCNP**, and **Palo Alto PCNSA**. Background in managing client relationships and driving solutions to enhance performance while adhering to compliance standards. Additionally experienced in the deployment of microservices, CI/CD pipelines, and AI/ML-powered platforms in a full-stack development environment using **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, **React**, **Node.js**, and **Django**.
